sources.title: Big Broadcast Of 1936 (1935)
sources.description: Â Jack Oakie, Bing Crosby, George Burns, Gracie Allen, Ethel Merman, The Nicholas Brothers, Akim Tamiroff, Bill Robinson, Carlos Gardel

metadata.Plot: Spud Miller hopes to save his struggling radio station by winning a broadcast competition, with the help of the Radio Eye, an invention that can display live events from anywhere in the world.
metadata.Writer: Walter DeLeon, Francis Martin, Ralph Spence
metadata.Actors: Jack Oakie, George Burns, Gracie Allen
